Package com.eclipsesource.tabris.ui

Interface UI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UIImpl
    public interface UI

    The UI is a shared object you will find all over the Tabris UI API. It's your handle for the whole UI once it was created. You can use it to navigate through your application.

    Since:
    0.11
    No Implement:
    This interface is not intended to be implemented by clients.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ActionConfiguration getActionConfiguration​(Action action)
      Returns an ActionConfiguration for a specific Action.
      ActionOperator getActionOperator()
      Returns the ActionOperator for the current session.
      UIConfiguration getConfiguration()
      Returns the UIConfiguration used to configure the current UI.
      org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display getDisplay()
      Returns the Display object for the current user.
      PageConfiguration getPageConfiguration​(Page page)
      Returns a PageConfiguration for a specific Page.
      PageOperator getPageOperator()
      Returns the PageOperator for the current session.

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplay

        org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display getDisplay()

        Returns the Display object for the current user.

        Since:
        1.0

      • getPageOperator

        PageOperator getPageOperator()

        Returns the PageOperator for the current session. With this operator you can do all the navigation.

        Since:
        1.0

      • getActionOperator

        ActionOperator getActionOperator()

        Returns the ActionOperator for the current session. With this you can manipulate the state of Action objects.

        Since:
        1.0

      • getConfiguration

        UIConfiguration getConfiguration()

        Returns the UIConfiguration used to configure the current UI. The configuration returned has session scope and can be used to manipulate the UI during runtime e.g. adding PageConfigurations and ActionConfigurations.

        Since:
        1.2

      • getPageConfiguration

        PageConfiguration getPageConfiguration​(Page page)

        Returns a PageConfiguration for a specific Page. Can be used to get the configuration options of a Page during runtime e.g. in a TransitionListener.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the page is null.
        Since:
        1.4

      • getActionConfiguration

        ActionConfiguration getActionConfiguration​(Action action)

        Returns an ActionConfiguration for a specific Action. Can be used to get the configuration options of an Action during runtime e.g. in an ActionListener.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the action is null.
        Since:
        1.4
